game.name: The Curse of Tethria
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Explore dungeons, avoid traps, fight monsters and progress through a hand-crafted world. Defeat your enemies with action combat using your sword and shield, the tools you find and items from the environment. Can you overcome these challenges to end the curse and restore the world from evil?
